Package com.google.gwt.gears.client.desktop

Desktop support for the Google Gears API for GWT.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
OpenFilesHandler A callback that asynchronously returns a list of open files.
 

Class Summary
BlobMetaData Represents metadata about a Blob that has been extracted by Desktop.extractMetaData(com.google.gwt.gears.client.blob.Blob).
Desktop The Desktop module provides an interface for accessing desktop related functionality, such as creating shortcuts or selecting files.
DesktopIcons Represents a Desktop Icon that can be created to launch a browser App.
File An object that represents a file on disk.
OpenFilesHandler.OpenFilesEvent Encapsulates the parameters to the openFiles event.
OpenFilesOptions A class that encapsulates the options to the Desktop.openFiles(OpenFilesHandler, OpenFilesOptions) method.
 

Package com.google.gwt.gears.client.desktop Description

Desktop support for the Google Gears API for GWT.

he Desktop module provides an interface for accessing desktop related functionality, such as creating shortcuts or selecting files.
